title: Autodidakt
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Autodidakt**

Autodidakt is the type design studio in Stockholm, [Sweden](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sweden), run by [Göran Söderström](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Goran%20Soderstrom).

**Commercial fonts:**  
The Satura Suite (2010), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/satura-suite).  
Meadow Condensed (2010), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/meadow).  
Heroine (2009), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/heroine).  
Meadow (2009), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/meadow).  
Flieger (2008), released by [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.fountaintype.com/typefaces/flieger).  
Shabash (2008), released by [PSY/OPS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_shabash.html).  
Exemplar (2008), released by [PSY/OPS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_exemplar.html).  
Navelfluff (2006), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000225).  
Trentor (2006), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000223).  
Trentor Script (2006), released by [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000224).

**Website & Social media:**  
 [http://www.autodidakt.se](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.autodidakt.se/ "http://www.autodidakt.se")  
 [http://www.facebook.com/autodidakt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/www.facebook.com/autodidakt "http://www.facebook.com/autodidakt")  
 [http://twitter.com/GoranSoderstrom](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203814/http:/twitter.com/GoranSoderstrom "http://twitter.com/GoranSoderstrom")
author: Goran Soderstrom
